mapper.select: SELECT p.t_no AS tNo, p.u_no AS uNo, p.m_no AS mNo, p.t_title AS tTitle, p.t_private AS tPrivate, p.t_saved AS tSaved, m.m_title AS coverTitle, a.a_name AS coverArtist FROM playlists p LEFT JOIN music m ON p.m_no = m.m_no LEFT JOIN artists a ON m.a_no = a.a_no WHERE p.u_no = #{uNo} ORDER BY p.t_no DESC
SELECT t_no AS tNo, u_no AS uNo, t_title AS tTitle, t_saved AS tSaved FROM playlists WHERE t_no = #{tNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT playists_seq.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO playlists (t_no, u_no, m_no, t_title, t_private, t_saved) VALUES (#{tNo}, #{uNo}, #{mNo}, #{tTitle}, #{tPrivate}, #{tSaved})
mapper.select: SELECT pt.pt_no AS ptNo, pt.t_no AS tNo, pt.m_no AS mNo, pt.m_order AS mOrder, m.m_title AS mTitle, a.a_name AS aName, b.b_image AS bImage FROM playlist_tracks pt LEFT JOIN music m ON pt.m_no = m.m_no LEFT JOIN artists a ON m.a_no = a.a_no LEFT JOIN album b ON m.b_no = b.b_no WHERE pt.t_no = #{tNo} ORDER BY pt.m_order ASC, pt.pt_no ASC
SELECT NVL(MAX(m_order), 0) + 1 FROM playlist_tracks WHERE t_no = #{tNo}

SELECT l.l_no AS lNo, l.u_no AS uNo, l.l_target_no AS mNo, m.m_title AS mTitle, a.a_name AS aName, b.b_image AS albumImg FROM likes l JOIN music m ON l.l_target_no = m.m_no JOIN artists a ON m.a_no = a.a_no JOIN album b ON m.b_no = b.b_no WHERE l.u_no = #{uNo} AND l.l_target_type = 'MUSIC' ORDER BY l.l_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO likes (l_no, u_no, l_target_type, l_target_no) VALUES (likes_seq.NEXTVAL, #{uNo}, 'MUSIC', #{mNo})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM likes WHERE u_no = #{uNo} AND l_target_type = 'MUSIC' AND l_target_no = #{mNo}
